message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm not sure if $14000 is a good deal for me. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $13000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11500 for the product.
I understand that $11500 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $12800.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $12800 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product.
